nodes.text: Hokkor Long was the Secretary in charge of scheduling for the Imperial Entertainers' Guild. In a communication to Viceprex Hirken on Stars' End, Hokkor Long apologized for rescheduling a visiting troupe of entertainers the Vice-President had requested. The communication was intercepted by Han Solo aboard the Millennium Falcon and used to his advantage in his attempt to spring his co-pilot Chewbacca during the Liberation of Stars' End.
